import React from "react"; import { experience } from "../data"; import Resume from "../documents/Tyler_Hooks_Resume.pdf"; import { BriefcaseIcon, CodeIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; export default function Experience() { return (

Work Experience

{experience.map((experience) => (

{experience.role}

{experience.company}

{experience.date}

{experience.description}

))}
Resume
) }
